description: Central Province Vehicle Dealing Cooperative Society Limited and Others 3 Vs. Assistant Commissioner of Corporative Development & 1 Other before Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
parties: Central Province Vehicle Dealing Cooperative Society Limited and Others 3 Vs. Assistant Commissioner of Corporative Development & 1 Other
judgement_by: Hon. K. M. S. DISSANAYAKE, J
keywords: Appeal from an judgement of a Provincial High Court in the exercise of the jurisdiction vested in it by Article 154P(3)(b) of the constitution- Dismissal of the Appeal by the Court of Appeal for want of appearance of the Appellant on the day assigned for their appearance by Court-Relisting application under section 769(2) of the Civil Procedure Code (as amended)-Applicability of section 769(2) of the Civil Procedure Code (as amended) in an application for relisting from an Order dismissing an appeal for want of appearance of the Appellant- Applicability of Sub-Rules (1) and (2) of the Rule 7 of the Court of Appeal (Procedure for Appeals from High Courts) Rules 1988-Guidelines that should be followed by a Court in hearing and determining an application for Relisting
legistation: Article 154P(3)(b) of Constitution of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka-Section 769(2) of the Civil Procedure Code (as amended)- Sub-Rules (1) and (2) of the Rule 7 of the Court of Appeal (Procedure for Appeals from High Courts) Rules 1988
